definition: to stop in the middle of sth/intermittent/intermittence
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
to rest/to take a break/to stop/to halt/(dialect) to sleep/a moment/a short while

sentences.english: The Rapid Displacement Heating (RDH) cooking process has been developed by Beloit Corporation as an energy efficient pulping system.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了快速置换加热间歇蒸煮化学和技术的原理。

sentences.english: Octahedron slurry pond in the upper intermittent rotation.
sentences.chinese: 八面体在浆池上方间歇性旋转。

sentences.english: Your anaerobic intervals should become incrementally longer and slower.
sentences.chinese: 您的无氧间歇跑应该延长时间和降低速度。

sentences.english: Intermittent showers pushed up water levels to record highs in two dams in Leizhou yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 间歇性阵雨推高水位纪录高点在两个水坝雷州昨天。

sentences.english: The following four years were a prosperous interlude.
sentences.chinese: 随后四年，是繁荣的间歇期。

sentences.english: He used such mannerism as “er” and “uh” to fill in a pause.
sentences.chinese: 他说话间歇时总爱用“呃”“嗯”之类的话搭头。

sentences.english: Some have argued that there will be a relatively secure interlude in the future.
sentences.chinese: 有人认为未来将会有一段相对安全的“间歇期”。

sentences.english: In this paper, the batch process to produce chloroacetic acid was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点介绍间歇式生产氯乙酸的工艺技术。

sentences.english: Method Trace back and analyze ECG of 50 cases of IPS.
sentences.chinese: 回顾性分析50例间歇性预激综合征的心电图。

sentences.english: Steam and hot water erupt from geysers.
sentences.chinese: 从间歇泉中喷出蒸汽和热水。

sentences.english: The batch production is expensive and low output.
sentences.chinese: 同时间歇式生产产量低，相对生产成本较高。
火山和间歇喷泉均能喷发。

sentences.english: Intermittent clutch or accumulator seal performance.
sentences.chinese: 间歇离合器或贮积器封口性能。

sentences.english: Transient reoccurring generalized joint pains, stiffness or swelling.
sentences.chinese: 间歇性全身关节疼痛，僵硬或肿胀。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the nursing management of clean intermittent catheterization (CIC) of spinal cord injured (SCI) patients.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨脊髓损伤患者清洁间歇导尿的护理管理。

sentences.english: All the cases were examined by EEG in the intermittent period.
sentences.chinese: 全部于间歇期描记单极及双极导联EEG。

definition: gap/interval/compartment/to divide/to separate/to leave a gap of (two weeks, three meters etc)
lit. to see a gap and stick in a needle (idiom); fig. to make use of every second and every inch
to gasp for breath/to take a breather
